description.p: Please answer the questions below. Your response will not be graded, but will be available for your instructor to read. Answering these questions may also shape the discussions in class.

likert_series.prompt: Evaluate your ability to perform each of the following tasks. In other words, how well can you do each task?

item.prompt: Identify and distinguish between cases in which procedures for independent samples, matched pairs, and ANOVA are appropriate.
In a given context, carry out the inferential method for comparing groups and draw the appropriate conclusions.
Specify the null and alternative hypotheses for comparing groups.
Choose the appropriate inferential method for examining the relationship between two variables and justify the choice.
In a given context, carry out the appropriate inferential method for comparing relationships and draw the appropriate conclusions.
Specify the null and alternative hypotheses for comparing relationships.

open_response.prompt: What concept or topic is the least clear to you at this point?
Please write any other questions you would like the instructor to address in class.
